```{r}
?geom_point
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, stroke = class))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(color = year)) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
   facet_wrap(~ class, nrow = 2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
   facet_grid(drv ~ cyl)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
   facet_grid(. ~ cyl)
```

#### continuous value
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
   facet_wrap(~ cty)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = drv, y = cyl))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
   geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
   facet_grid(drv ~ .)
```
